title: Ride-On Scrubber Drier DRO 100P
description: The Dynaclean industries DRO-100P ride on scrubber drier is a fully battery operated comes with ergonomic features like smart controls for long operational times and comfort, ensuring precise floor scrubbing with little physical exertion from users. Their broad scrubbing areas along with water tank capacities make cleaning at airport, hospitals, malls, and even parking. Ride on scrubber machine of this nature are best suited for industrial or commercial grade scrub and dryer operations.
keyFeatures: High Cleaning Efficiency with the fully battery-operated system cleans an area of up to 4,000 m²/hr.
DRO-100P floor scrubber drier operates silently and ideal for noise-sensitive environments.
Long-Lasting Performance Increased cleaning efficiency with minimal refills and waste disposals.
Equipped with a 95L clean water tank and 100L recovery tank for extended cleaning without frequent refills
Flexible Uses the floor scrubber machine is optimal for use in busy areas airports, stations, industrial places etc.
DRO-100P floor scrubber machine features a high-grade squeegee ensures maximum water pickup and drying in a single pass.
Durable and low-maintenance design features an industrial-grade scrubbing brush gives consistent cleaning.
Ride on scrubber drier DRO-100P is a fully battery-operated and eliminates the need for external power sources.
